examples.text: İki gün önce yani 26 eylûl salı günü İstanbul'da harp akademisinde bu sene akademiden mezun olan kara ve deniz zabitlerimize merasimle diplomaları dağıtılmıştır.
examples.translation: Two days ago, on Tuesday, September 26, diplomas were ceremoniously distributed to army and navy officers who graduated from the military academy in Istanbul this year.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish مأذون (mezun), from Arabic مَأْذُون (maʔḏūn), passive participle of أَذِنَ (ʔaḏina).
